fields.title: Broadcast
fields.description: If true, celebration will be broadcasted to other entities in the radius.

fields.title: Celeberation Targets
fields.description: The list of conditions that target of hunt must satisfy to initiate celebration.

fields.title: Celebrate Sound
fields.description: The sound event to play when the mob is celebrating

fields.title: Radius
fields.description: If broadcast is enabled, specifies the radius in which it will notify other entities for celebration.

fields.title: Sound Interval
fields.description: The range of time in seconds to randomly wait before playing the sound again
